title: Pi to Host Frame Message
description: Schema for frame messages sent from Raspberry Pi to Host via UDP/JSON

camera_id.description: Unique identifier for the camera/Raspberry Pi

timestamp.description: Unix epoch timestamp in microseconds (int64). Represents the frame capture completion time, PTP-synchronized if available.

frame_index.description: Monotonically increasing frame counter per camera (uint32). Used as secondary pairing key if timestamp fails.

blobs.description: Array of detected reflective marker blobs in image coordinates

x.description: X coordinate in pixels (image coordinates, unrectified)

y.description: Y coordinate in pixels (image coordinates, unrectified)
